name: protocol
description: Defines the protocol between the [client](https://github.com/GHSTMiners/Client) and the [server](https://github.com/GHSTMiners/ServerV2) using [protobuf](https://developers.google.com/protocol-buffers).

scripts.build: npm run protobuf && npm run compile
scripts.protobuf: pbjs --target static-module --wrap commonjs --out src\Messages\index.js src\Messages\**\*.proto && pbts -o src\Messages\index.d.ts src\Messages\index.js
